data.title: After Shahid Kapoor, Shraddha Kapoor Starts Shooting For Batti Gul Meter Chalu
meta_keywords: Shraddha Kapoor Starts Shooting For Batti Gul Meter Chalu
data.meta_description: The film is slated to release on August 31, 2018. - After Shahid Kapoor, Shraddha Kapoor Starts Shooting For Batti Gul Meter Chalu
data.meta_site_name: Latest News, Breaking News, LIVE News, Top News Headlines, Viral Video, Cricket LIVE, Sports, Entertainment, Business, Health, Lifestyle and Utility News | India.Com
data.text:
The film is slated to release on August 31, 2018.

Bollywood actress Shraddha Kapoor has started shooting for her upcoming film titled ‘Batti Gul Meter Chalu’. The actress is excited to start the new journey. Earlier today, Shraddha took to her Twitter handle to share her excitement with her fans and followers; Shraddha wrote, “Day 1 on ‘Batti Gul Meter Chalu’ excited to start this new journey! See you on set Shahid Kapoor! Wish me luck guys!”

Shahid has already started shooting for the film. Recently, even Shahid had taken to his social media handle to share a still from the sets of Batti Gul Meter Chalu and captioned the post as, “Day 1. On set. Batti Gul meter Chalu.Here we go. #goodpeople#goodvibes” To be shot in Uttarakhand, the film is touted to be a social comedy-drama and also features Yami Gautam in lead role, who will be seen playing a lawyer.

Written by Vipul K Rawal and helmed by Shree Narayan Singh, (who helmed the Akshay Kumar and Bhumi Pednekar starrer Toilet: Ek Prem Katha) Shahid Kapoor and Shraddha Kapoor starrer is slated to hit the silver screen on August 31, 2018. Shahid and Shraddha will be sharing the screen space after 3 years; they were first seen together in Vishal Bhardwaj’s ‘Haider’, which was a desi adaptation of Shakespeare’s play ‘Hamlet’. The film is bankrolled by Prernaa Arora of KriArj Entertainment and Bhushan Kumar and Krishan Kumar under the banner of T-Series. ALSO READ: Bigg Boss 11 Contestants Puneesh Sharma And Bandgi Kalra Engaged?

On the professional front, Shraddha is currently shooting for Prabhas-starrer Saaho. She will also be seen in Amole Gupte’s Saina, as ace badminton player Saina Nehwal. Shahid, meanwhile, Shahid Kapoor’s Padmaavat is doing great business at the box office. The film hit the theatres on January 25 amid various protests and has since crossed Rs. 250 crore mark at the box office. Watch this space for further updates.

Inputs From IANS
